Please include the file ./readme.md in your repository to provide custom instructions for GitHub Copilot. This file can help guide Copilot's suggestions to better fit your project's needs.

## Using README.md for Copilot Instructions

Create a `./readme.md` file in your repository root with your custom coding guidelines. Copilot will reference this file when:

- Generating code suggestions
- Completing functions
- Proposing new implementations

**Example README.md structure:**

** Never Guess, always consult the official documentation for accuracy. **
